item.description:
Limited availability to one of the best ski weekends of the year. Join the Wedelns for a fun weekend of skiing / riding and debauchery as we ski and ride at Wildcat Mountain and then come back for fantastic apres-ski events. 

Costs

Guest Fee - $25/night

Meals - $15 Dinner Saturday night (vegetarian option available - please indicate in your RSVP)

 

The Skinny

Rooms are separated by gender and are dorm style.

Please bring the following with you:

Bedding- Sleeping bag and pillow or twin sheets, blanket, and pillow. ear plugs may be helpful. 

Toiletries - Towel, soap / shampoo, hair dryer, flip flops for the shower

Beverages - we have a beverage only refrigerator that can be utilized by our guests.

Skis/Snowboard/Snowshoes/cross-country skies - we have a place where you can store these items or there are many places to rent these items. 

Discounted Lift tickets - Available for Black Mountain on Sunday 3/4

Due to the popularity of this weekend, we are limiting the number of meetup guests to 10 people. To RSVP, please click "yes" and then you will have to pay a deposit of $26 (Guest fees of $25 for 1 night and $1 Amazon Payment transaction fee).

Sorry, No refunds.

Reservations are open now and close on the evening of Sunday, 2/26 9PM

Please feel free to contact me if you have any questions, issues, or concerns. 

21+ only

Regards,

Jonathan
item.how_to_find_us: Directions to those guests who have paid and RSVP'd yes
item.name: World Famous Skiing Weekend March 2 - March 4, 2012
